My Soviet Space Program mod will add support for these once my post-1.2 release comes out. :-)
Don't forget right now , solar apnel need NFT update and interstellar fuelswith
wow, what a great mod

can i ask what is the status of updating to 1.2.1? I am not asking when it will happen, just want to know what is working and what needs to be updated and if they need to be updated, at what stage they are ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")

Sry guys, i was taking a break from KSP, i work on a personal project, so i don't have new parts.

All parts mods seams to work fine for me in 1.2.2 , tell me if there is something.

![U1HlJnE.png](http://i.imgur.com/U1HlJnE.png)

WIP, i made a alternative orbital booster for mercury ( BDB style), with 4 individual solid booster shots.

I'm trying to use Ring Landing Legs, but they are not working for 1.2.2. Do I need some extra stuff for them?

Hey [@blacsky33](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129435-blacsky33/),

Nice mods. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")

Could you update them on <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr> to 1.2.2, please?
Could you update them for 1.3.1, please ?

Cargo. Mercury. AAAAAAAAAAAAAAH

Now that ksp dlc is here, i finish those 3 parts, i think it will help make better historical mission, compatible with BDB parts in mind: 

[Mercury parts](https://www.dropbox.com/s/97b9anpyp4n9y6m/Hermes%20MBI.zip?dl=0)

btw i tried my other parts , all seem to be working.
holy crap this looks like it was made by a monkey

oof [@blacsky33](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129435-blacsky33/) that is so awesome. One of my great regrets of the Mercury and Gemini parts in BDB, because they were adopted from other stockalike mods, aren't as accurate / detailed as they could be. Those parts are awesome!

I made a small mission , early mercury program (little joe) , you need mods: <abbr title="Kerbal Engineer Redux (mod)">KER</abbr>, BDB, tantares , tantaresLV and the folder inside this link :

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/dsn7cnm8plb0xww/Mercury program part MBI.zip?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/dsn7cnm8plb0xww/Mercury%20program%20part%20MBI.zip?dl=0)
